resources.string:
%1$c
Press SELECT 3x



If you don't see that notification on your watch, make sure you have notifications enabled for %3$s in the Pebble Time app.

%2$d

%1$c
%2$s



If you don't see that notification on your watch, make sure you have notifications enabled for that %4$s in the Pebble Time app.

%3$d
%1$s\n\nPick correct text from menu or retry.

%s\n\n
Use retry from actions menu to retry voice input.
Sorry, voice input is not working without microphone permission. Please enable it under Android System Settings -> Apps ->
Sorry, voice input is not working without microphone permission. Please enable it under Android System Settings -> Apps
